title: Saturnalia guide
text: Hello, welcome to a WIP Saturnalia (the video game) guide. Currently, the only feature is a clue map, you can navigate there using the top menu.

title: Saturnalia guide
Contribute
text:
If you’re not familiar with GitHub, feel free to email me or DM me in Discord.
For inspiration, here’s some changes I’d like to make:


Spellcheck all clues


Add locations for all clues


Show pre-requisites for clues, for example ‘must be playing as Claudia’


Add images for all clues


Add quest guides for the playable characters + tecla + town quest


Endgame scoreboard rules


Achievement guides


Quest guides, for spoiler free hints at what to do next


Characters page, listing lore and character abilities
